author: geirm
msg: New method to support finding if a template exists w/o having to
specify the encoding, or having the side effect of the resource getting
cached.  Needed to support Velocity.templateExists().  Not a great
solution by any stretch of the imagination, but we can revisit, and needed
to get this fixed for the encoding-happy Turbiners.

author: geirm
msg: Added new method and delegation to call through to ResourceManager.  Needed
to support a side-effect-free implementation of Velocity.templateExists()

author: geirm
msg: Changed implementation of templateExists() to avoid loading the template,
which was a side effect.  This is a problem in the brave new world of
encodings, as it doesn't make sense to specify the encoding with
So this impl uses a new ResourceManager method, and we can improve/extend
the underlying stuff if need be.  Just wanted to get this fixed for the

author: geirm
msg: updates examples to reflect new config properties for file paths.
